## Prerequisites

### Data Structures in base R
  1. Atomic vector (integer, double, logical, character)
  2. Recursive vector (list)
  3. Factor
  4. Matrix and array
  5. Data Frame

### R base programming
  1. Control Statements
  2. Functions
  3. Functionals
  4. Input/output
  5. Rstudio API (application programming interface)
